audios.au: This is the diagram of an ECAS systems for motor vehicles in the so called full air variant, which means equipped with air suspension on the front and the rear axle. The main components of the systems are the ECAS ECU, ...
... the front axle valve for 1-point control of the front axle ...
and the rear axle valve for a 2-point control of the rear axle.
Accordingly, the actual level is measured at the front axle using one height sensor ...
and at the rear axle with two height sensors.
The supporting bellows of the front axle are jointly ...
and the bellows of the rear axle separately pressurized and vented.
